snippet: The narrative the Clippers were clinging to, that they were the team of destiny after so much turmoil, was shattered by the Thunder, who advanced to the Western Conference finals.
abstract: Los Angeles Clippers begin reckoning with their season-ending loss to Oklahoma City Thunder; team, reeling from turmoil surrounding owner Donald Sterling, had hoped to redeem themselves with a championship victory.
lead_paragraph: The narrative the Clippers were clinging to, that they were the team of destiny after so much turmoil, was shattered by the Thunder, who advanced to the Western Conference finals.

headline.main: Clippers Can’t Believe Their Surreal Season Has Ended
headline.print_headline: Clippers Can’t Believe Their Surreal Season Has Come to a Close
